price: 21. Ir kiekvienas asmuo ateis su (angelu) jį vedančiu, ir su (angelu) prieš jį liudijančiu.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
